column3: utACK 5a3eefc4 how much work would it be to make the scripts fully compatible with BSD grep? Would be nice to remove the gnu grep requirement.
There's another empty subexpression in `lint-shell-locale.sh`, line 18

@Empact Fixed the GNU:Ism in `lint-shell-locale.sh`. Do you know of any other incompatibility with BSD grep? I've now added a linter that will help us avoid introducing GNU:isms in our shell scripts :-)\n\nPlease re-review!

Thanks for doing this but...\n*sigh* more shell-lowest-common-denominator-porting\nI wish we just bit the bullet ported this stuff to Python so that it's, by definition, not dependent on external tools.
As an alternative to the linter here, I set up running the linter checks on Mac via Travis, #13728.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13728 (Scripts and tools: Run the CI lint stage on mac and linux both by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
I prefer @Empact:s solution in #13728 which runs the linter chers on Mac via Travis\n\n Closing this PR since it won't be relevant when #13728 has been merged.
